name: 仲間たちの為に リムル

ability: 【A】When your other Character's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, choose 1 of your 《魔大陸》 Character, during this turn, it gets +500 Power.

If you did, place 2 cards from your top Deck into Waiting Room. If all of them are 《魔大陸》 Character or Yellow Climax among those cards, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, place it into this card's previous slot on Stage.
